resources.string: This app enables the double tap to wake feature for the Nexus 6P. ROOT IS REQUIRED FOR IT TO WORK!
Double tap to wake is enabled
Double tap to wake is disabled
App Version: 1.1 \nCreated by: Russell Waterson \nQuestions or comments: rwatersondev@gmail.com

Enable double tap to wake on your Nexus 6P. Once activated, there is no need to open the app again, it will run the command upon reboot.

This app simply unlocks a built in feature within your nexus device and therefore has no effect on battery life.
"
"Be sure to send me an email if any problems were encountered.
